fields.name: user_registration
fields.email_body: Your account has been successfully registered with KOS

fields.name: user_membership_submission_introducer_message
fields.email_body:
Dear Doctor {{introducer_full_name}}


{{user_full_name}} has applied for the KOS membership and suggested your name as an introducer.

Please click here to Accept

{{accept}}

or click here to Reject

{{reject}}.


Note: This link is valid for one time ONLY

fields.name: membership_confirmation_submission_to_user
fields.email_subject: Your account has been created successfully
fields.email_body: You have successfully completed your KOS membership form and your provisional KOS membership number is : {{provisional_membership_id}}

fields.name: ic_paper_submission_to_applicant
fields.email_body: Your instruction course has been successfully submitted and the course number is :{{paper_id}}

fields.name: free_paper_submission_to_applicant
fields.email_body: Your free paper has been successfully submitted and the course number is :{{paper_id}}

fields.name: video_paper_submission_to_applicant
fields.email_body: Your video paper has been successfully submitted and the course number is :{{paper_id}}

fields.name: ic_paper_submission_to_evaluator
fields.email_body: Dear Dr. {{evaluator_full_name}}, The instruction course assigned to you for evaluation is    _______ and the course number is :{{private_paper_id}}

fields.name: free_paper_submission_to_evaluator
fields.email_body: Dear Dr. {{evaluator_full_name}}, The free paper assigned to you for evaluation is    _______ and the paper number is :{{private_paper_id}}

fields.name: video_paper_submission_to_evaluator
fields.email_body: Dear Dr. {{evaluator_full_name}}, The video paper assigned to you for evaluation is    _______ and the course number is :{{private_paper_id}}

fields.name: kos_evaluator_invite
fields.email_body: Dear Dr. {{user_full_name}} , You have been invited to be an evaluator at https://member.kosonline.org. Please click this {{link}} to confirm.

fields.name: non_kos_evaluator_invite
fields.email_body: Dear Dr. {{user_full_name}} , You have been invited to be an evaluator at https://member.kosonline.org. Please click this {{link}} to confirm.

fields.name: payment_capture_to_user
fields.email_body: Your membership fee has been successfully received by KOS. Thank you

fields.name: payment_capture_to_kos_info
fields.email_body: User {{member_full_name}} has paid the membership fee successfully.

fields.name: force_user_to_profile_update
fields.email_body: We are happy to announce that out official website is ready and it is on live. We have updated your details on the website whatever was submitted by you at the time of membership registration.Now we have made a provision to update the profile if there are any changes in the same.Request you to visit https://member.kosonline.org/ and register yourselves by creating an account. You can go to “My profile” and edit if there are any changes needed.

fields.name: introducer_accept_or_reject_response_to_user
fields.email_body: Introducer {{introducer_full_name}} has {{opinion}} your application

fields.name: membership_form_confiramtion_to_secretary
fields.email_body:
Dr. {{user_full_name}} has applied for a KOS membership.
Introducer one {{introducer_one_full_name}} has accepted the membership.
Introducer two {{introducer_two_full_name}} has accepted the membership.
Please click here to Accept

{{accept}}

or Reject

{{reject}}


Note: this link is valid for one time

fields.name: after_sceretary_approve_kos_number_to_user
fields.email_body: Congratulations! Your membership has been accepted and your KOS membership number is : {{kos_number}}

fields.name: after_sceretary_not_approve_membership_to_user
fields.email_subject: The KOS Secretary has rejected your membership application
fields.email_body: The KOS Secretary has rejected your membership application

fields.name: marks_difference_to_admin
fields.email_body: For the paper {{paper_id}}, evaluator {{evaluator_full_name}} given marks {{marks}}, which is making difference of more than {30%} compare to others already given marks that is {{others already given marks}}

fields.name: ratify_membership_by_agm_to_agm
fields.email_body:
Hi, These members {{members_full_name}} need to be ratified

click here to Accept

{{accept}}

or reject here

{{reject}}

fields.name: ratify_membership_by_agm_approve_to_user
fields.email_body: Hi, Your membership is ratified successfully by KOS AGM.

fields.name: ratify_membership_by_agm_unapprove_to_user
fields.email_body: Hi, Your membership is not ratified by KOS AGM

fields.name: member_deceased
fields.email_body: Hi, {{member_full_name}} and KOS number {{kos_number}}  has been deceased, this deceased member can't able to login further.

fields.name: member_resign
fields.email_body: Hi {{member_full_name}} and kos number {{kos_number}}, user resigned, resigned member can't able to login further, please contact admin for further details

fields.name: forgot_password_otp_request
fields.email_body: OTP is {{otp}} to reset password

fields.name: resend_otp_request
fields.email_subject: OTP resend for the reset password
fields.email_body: The verification code from KOS is {{otp}} for user name {{username}}.
